title: Introduction to Imagined Speech Decoding Using Transfer Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Concepts and Foundational Knowledge of Deep Learning
context.additional_context: Small-scale customized education conducted in smartphone-based limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand the concept of transfer learning and apply it to simulated voice decoding problems.
Learners can explain how to design a transfer learning model in a limited EEG dataset environment
Learners can simulate the knowledge transfer process between the FEIS/KaraOne datasets based on the proposed DL framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
